name: Enemy Waves Sequence
author: Alucard648
info: Defeat spawning enemies until all waves are gone.Made by Request by SkyFlare.
description: Enemies spawn in waves. When all waves are spawned and all ebenies are killed, secrets pop open.
setup: ghost.zh required.Place invisible FFC anywhere in the screen. D0 - D7 - defines enemy waves. Each argument defines enemy wave in following scheme: #####.____ - delay between previous wave and this one, in frames. -1 - wait until all beatable enemies are gone. _____.###_ - ID of enemy to spawn. _____.___# - number of enemies to spawn, 1-9.
